name: Mage Product Select for ACF
author: Nick wan

sections.description:
Mage Product Select for ACF

Base on ACF Field Type Template. If you want to select MAGE products in your ACF field only, return you the Ids.

Compatibility

This ACF field type is compatible with: * ACF 5
sections.installation:
1. Install Magento WordPress integration, make sure it works first.
  2. Copy the plugin folder into your wp-content/plugins folder
  3. Activate the plugin via the plugins admin page
  4. Create a new field via ACF and select the Magento Products type
  5. Please refer to the description for more info regarding the field type settings
